brandTone.missionStatement: BMW is a leading automotive brand dedicated to delivering premium vehicles that combine performance, innovation, and luxury. The brand is committed to creating driving experiences that inspire joy, precision, and sustainability, while pushing the boundaries of technology and design. BMW aims to shape the future of mobility with a focus on excellence and customer satisfaction.
brandTone.toneOfVoice: premium, innovative, dynamic, sophisticated, confident, forward-thinking, precise, luxurious, aspirational, performance-driven, cutting-edge, elegant, bold, reliable, visionary
brandTone.favoriteKeywords: performance, innovation, luxury, precision, driving, technology, sustainability, excellence, design, future, mobility, premium, dynamic, experience, joy
brandTone.wordsToAvoid: cheap, basic, outdated, slow, inefficient, ordinary, unreliable, impractical, dull, fragile, cumbersome, generic, stagnant, inferior, wasteful
